1.author: Robert De Niro
1.quote: Time goes on. So whatever you’re going to do, do it. Do it now. Don’t wait.

2.author: Walt Disney
2.quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.

3.author: Confucius
3.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

4.author: Roy T. Bennett
4.quote: Believe in yourself. You are braver than you think, more talented than you know, and capable of more than you imagine.

5.author: Wayne Dyer
5.quote: If you believe it will work out, you’ll see opportunities. If you believe it won’t, you will see obstacles.

6.author: George Addair
6.quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.

7.author: Winston Churchill
7.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.

8.author: Paulo Coelho
8.quote: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure

9.author: Brian Tracy
9.quote: Your true success in life begins only when you make the commitment to become excellent at what you do.

10.author: Chantal Sutherland
10.quote: Believe in yourself, take on your challenges, dig deep within yourself to conquer fears. Never let anyone bring you down. You got to keep going.

11.author: Les Brown
11.quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.

12.author: Bob Riley
12.quote: Hard times don’t create heroes. It is during the hard times when the ‘hero’ within us is revealed.

13.author: Jack Canfield
13.quote: If you can tune into your purpose and really align with it, setting goals so that your vision is an expression of that purpose, then life flows much more easily.

14.author: Napolean Hill
14.quote: Whatever the mind can conceive and believe, it can achieve.

15.author: Jim Rohn
15.quote: Don’t wish it were easier. Wish you were better.

16.author: Serena Williams
16.quote: A champion is defined not by their wins but by how they can recover when they fall.

17.author: Sheryl Sandberg
17.quote: Motivation comes from working on things we care about.

18.author: Reese Witherspoon
18.quote: With the right kind of coaching and determination you can accomplish anything.

19.author: Hazrat Inayat Khan
19.quote: Some people look for a beautiful place. Others make a place beautiful.

20.author: Albert Einstein
20.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.

21.author: Walt Disney
21.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

22.author: Winston Churchill
22.quote: A pessimist sees the difficulty in every opportunity; an optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty.

23.author: Will Rogers
23.quote: Don't let yesterday take up too much of today.

24.author: Vince Lombardi
24.quote: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.

25.author: Steve Jobs
25.quote: If you are working on something that you really care about, you don’t have to be pushed. The vision pulls you.
